alert.note: Alert for Jones (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 5:50PM CDT until June 17 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Jones County in west central Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 550 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hodges, or near Hawley, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Nugent around 605 PM CDT. Lueders around 615 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Funston, Hodges, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Truby and The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Farm Road 600. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
